comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.24) Gecko/20111104 Red Hat/3.6-3.el5_7 Firefox/3.6.24
Build ID: 20111104075907

Steps to reproduce:

Trying to print: 

http://sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalligrafi

to a printer with built in stapling. When using the native print dialog (print.extend_native_print_dialog set to 'true') the stapling options isn't sent to the printer.
When setting print.extend_native_print_dialog to 'false' it works. 

I printed to file to see the difference between the generated files:

14c14
< %%CreationDate: 12/23/2011 9:15:17
---
> %%CreationDate: 12/23/2011 9:17:32
1030c1030
< %%BeginFeature: *Collate True
---
> %%BeginFeature: *Collate False
1032c1032
<       << /Collate true >> setpagedevice
---
>       << /Collate false >> setpagedevice
1041c1041
< %%BeginFeature: *StapleLocation SinglePortrait
---
> %%BeginFeature: *StapleLocation None
1043,1045c1043
<         (<<) cvx exec /Collate true (>>) cvx exec setpagedevice
<         (<<) cvx exec /Staple 3 (>>) cvx exec setpagedevice
<         (<<) cvx exec /StapleDetails (<<) cvx exec /Type 1 /StapleLocation (SinglePortrait) (>>) cvx exec (>>) cvx exec setpagedevice
---
>         (<<) cvx exec /Staple 0(>>) cvx exec setpagedevice
7432c7430
< 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:13)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
---
> 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:17)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
8871c8869
< 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:13)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
---
> 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:17)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
11068c11066
< 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:13)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
---
> 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:17)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
11436c11434
< 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:13)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 
---
> 2078 3398 M (2011-12-23 09:17)[21 21 19 21 15 21 21 14 21 21 10 21 21 12 21  0]xS 

This could of course affect other options as well, but I haven't tested this.

OS: Windows 7.



Actual results:

No stapling options were sent to the printer.


Expected results:

Stapling options should be sent to the printer.

comments.text:
I can confirm that this bug is still present with Firefox 28.0 / Windows 2008R2.
Fortunately, the workaround described by Johann Bengtsson also still works.
comments.raw_text:
I can confirm that this bug is still present with Firefox 28.0 / Windows 2008R2.
Fortunately, the workaround described by Johann Bengtsson also still works.
